snippet.title: Snow Ash Land - Trailer
snippet.description:
Snow Ash Land is a multiplayer post-apocalyptic top-down shooter game with rpg mechanics and survival in semi-open world. It simulates a dying society in a post-apocalyptic world. Guided by factions with very different ideologies, the player can choose to help rebuild civilization or destroy humanity.

There's a lot of interractions between players in multiplayer mode : Guilds, pvp territory wars, resources and informations exchanges, language, politics, economy, building...

DISCORD : https://discord.gg/3j6e33k
https://store.steampowered.com/app/977670/Snow_Ash_Land/

Forum : 
https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=61514.0
